prompts: Create a cute bear-like Pokemon that can lift heavy objects with ease.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines the features of a toy and a real animal.
Generate a bear Pokemon with pink fur and a playful attitude.
Show me a Pokemon that has a strong bond with trainers and loves to hug.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats and is known for its strength.
Design a friendly Pokemon that uses its power to protect its friends.
Give me a Pokemon that resembles a cuddly bear but is very strong in battle.
